name: Chapter 6: Bridging the Gap
short_description: With growing trust and cooperation, the Enterprise and Codarian coders work together. They face hurdles and potential sabotage along the way, but manage to decipher the final part of the message, revealing the cosmic threat in detail.
from_prev_chapter: The combined efforts begin to make progress in decoding the message.
to_next_chapter: The crew prepares to take action based on the fully decoded message to prevent the impending disaster.
